definition: to rely mainly on/to attach most importance to
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
lit. the guest acts as host (idiom); fig. to turn from passive to active behavior

sentences.english: What is more, we have other two factories which are in Shanghai and Suzhou in China to supply the local market.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在上海和苏州也有设厂，以供应当地市场为主。

sentences.english: Or that double-digit interest rates dominated the 19th century?
sentences.chinese: 或者19世纪的利率以两位数为主？

sentences.english: The seasonal sea level change is of annual period and the second oscillation is of semi-annual period.
sentences.chinese: 月平均海面以年周期振动为主，其次是半年周期。

sentences.english: These results suggest that pathway which cancer cells entered lymphatics was mainly by destructing walls of lymphatics.
sentences.chinese: 提示癌细胞进入淋巴管的途径以破坏管壁为主。

sentences.english: Of product structure, in order, represented by lower-middle class plush toys.
sentences.chinese: 就产品结构而言，以长毛绒为代表的中低档玩具为主。

sentences.english: Reporter discovered that this year many brands spin the thing red by primarily .
sentences.chinese: 记者发现，今年许多品牌家纺用品还是以红色为主。

sentences.english: At Levels 5 and 6, the Vocabulary test measures listening vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 在第五和第六级，单字测验是以听力为主。

sentences.english: At present it mainly contains anti-inflammatory and immune regulation in the treatment of UC.
sentences.chinese: 目前UC的治疗以抗炎和调节免疫反应为主。

sentences.english: Treatment strategies of IM were antiviral and symptomatically therapy.
sentences.chinese: 本组治疗以抗病毒和对症治疗为主。

sentences.english: Method The technique of direct powder compression was adopted using compressible starch as the main excipient .
sentences.chinese: 方法采用可压性淀粉为主辅料，粉末直接压片。

sentences.english: I take world history as my major.
sentences.chinese: 我以教育心理学为主修专业。

sentences.english: Porous ceramics is a kind of inorganic non-metal material that mostly includes pores.
sentences.chinese: 多孔陶瓷是一类以气孔为主相的无机非金属材料。

sentences.english: Majoring in yellow wine, the group is actively developing its relevant extended products.
sentences.chinese: 集团公司以黄酒为主业，积极发展黄酒相关延伸产品。

sentences.english: The contest becomes mainly one of feint and counterfeint.
sentences.chinese: 这场比赛变成了一场以佯攻与反佯攻为主的较量。

sentences.english: Body-centered exercises also have an effect on the mind.
sentences.chinese: 以身体为主的训练也可以对心理产生影响。

sentences.english: Less the amount of meat, mainly to satisfy their craving.
sentences.chinese: 肉食的量要少，以解馋为主。

definition: to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
main point of an argument/a principal viewpoint
to stress in a prejudiced way/to emphasize sth unduly
used in the construction 以...為例|以...为例, "to take ... as an example"
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
